channel.title: Netgear Portforwarding problem (With pics)
channel.description:
Ok, well, to start off. My computer has a very bad virus on it called the MonaRonaDona Virus and was the main computer in the house.(I am currently using my moms that feeds off mine.) I had to go get my computer fixed today but sadly Bestbuy is closed do to the weather. So, my mom doesn't use a router, she uses a wirless link-up in the back of her computer that goes from mine to hers, etc...
Well, I figured out how to host on mine. I could actually host other people. But my moms computer is a little different. But, I have portforwarded(pic below)
Neatgear Portforwarding:
1st Pic: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/2nd.jpg[/img]
2nd Pic: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/3rd.jpg[/img]
3rd Pic: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/4th.jpg[/img]
4th Pic: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/5th.jpg[/img]
I have also enabled Port 43594 TCP/UDP for her firewall: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/1st-1.jpg[/img]
Installed Moparscape with Aryan. I also have no-ip DUC and have enabled my DUC IP: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/1st.jpg[/img]
If anyone knows how to fix this please help me. Don't flame my thread please. If I've forgotten something, tell me please.

item.title: Netgear Portforwarding problem (With pics)
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Honestly man. Idk what’s wrong. Maybe you can’t host of wirless internet. Considering mine is getting repaired and it was the host. I’m pretty sure everything is right tbh. but Idk why it isn’t working.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 06:47:32 PM[/size][hr]I guess nobody knows or apparently doesn’t care…

Read full topic

all rite accep ur portwarded not same as mine…and i cant go in this linkhttp://192.168.1.1/ it will say inter explore cannot display
